Text:
The ZWT-keys als work for VMware 8.0.2-591240.
Make a trial-accout on the VMware site and download the installer.

People using a 3.2/3.3 kernel need to apply this patch before they run vmware:
http://weltall.heliohost.org/wordpress/2012/01/26/vmware-workstation-8-0-2-player-4-0-2-fix-for-linux-kernel-3-2-and-3-3/
